Description: SHIPPING & INSURANCE IS INCLUDED IN THE BUY IT NOW PRICE FOR EASY CALCULATION usually $120~170 USD Here is a super rare 2000 ESP MX 250 James Hetfield Metallica Explorer guitar for sale! Mahogany body, mahogany neck w/ ebony fretboard, all black finish and black hardware, EMG active pick ups w/ vol & tone controls + 3 way pu selector switch, Schaller strap locks, guitar weighs 3.6 kilos on my digital scale, non orignal Ritter gig bag included! This 18+ year old vintage guitar has been played w/ some scratches, tiny dings & dimples( I tried to show it all in the pics as best as possible under a light), tuning pegs have been changed to Sperzel locking pegs but original Gotoh tuning pegs included, some fret wear, some wear on the hardware & screws due to age & use, Overall condition 8.7/10!!! * I am not a vintage specialist, luthier or a guitar shop. Please look at all the pics carefully for exact condition, details & originality. I do not have any other info or history of this guitar, so please don't ask. Google for exact spec & additional info! *** I HAVE DESCRIBED THE DETAILS OF THIS VINTAGE USED GUITAR TO THE BEST OF MY KNOWLEDGE *** PLEASE ASK ALL QUESTIONS, LOOK AT ALL THE PICS, JUDGE and DECIDE FOR YOURSELF BEFORE PURCHASE *** SALE IS FINAL / NO CLAIMS or RETURNS / SOLD AS IS *** IMMEDIATE PAYMENT BY PAYPAL ONLY *** ALL RUDE MESSAGES WILL BE REPORTED TO EBAY IMMEDIATELY AND WILL AUTOMATICALLY BE ON MY BID BLOCK LIST PERMANENTLY *** *** I will ONLY ship to your VERIFIED/CONFIRMED paypal address *** I will pack this guitar very well in a heavy duty guitar box, and ship by EMS(express mail service) fully insured through Japan post to your Postal carrier *** Delivery time varies depending on your location and how fast the customs in your country will clear the item (usually 4-7 days to USA) *** *** USA buyers have not been taxed so far ****** ALL TAXES, CUSTOMS FEES, or IMPORT DUTIES ARE BUYERS RESPONSIBILITY *** THESE CHARGES WILL BE COLLECTED BY CUSTOMS IN YOUR COUNTRY BEFORE OR ON DELIVERY *** PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR LOCAL TAX LAWS & REGULATIONS REGARDING THIS MATTER *** *** I will not be responsible for any damages occurred during transit as I do not have any control over the handling of the package *** If a claim does arise, I will assist you 100% with insurance claim! *** I will ship within 24-48 Hours after receiving payment in full *** I will send all EMS tracking information right after the item has been shipped *** Thanks for looking!!!
Title: 2000 ESP MX 250 JAMES HETFIELD METALLICA EXPLORER SUPER RARE!!!
